text: Juliet of the Spirits () is a 1965 Italian French fantasy comedy-drama movie directed by Federico Fellini and starring Giulietta Masina, Sandra Milo, Mario Pisu, Valentina Cortese, Valeska Gert, Friedrich von Ledebur, Caterina Boratto, George Ardisson, Anne Francine. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1967. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1965 comedy-drama movies Category:1960s fantasy movies Category:Italian fantasy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:French fantasy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Federico Fellini Category:Movies set in Rome
title: Juliet of the Spirits
